mean_cn: vt. 回忆，回想；想起；  vi. 记忆
mean_en: (not used in the progressive tenses) (rather formal) to remember something, especially by making an effort to remember it
sentence: He’s looking through some old photos and recollecting the days gone by.
sentence_trans: 他正看着这些老照片，回忆起过去的日子。
word_etyma: re重新 ＋ col一起 ＋ lect选择，收集 → [记忆]重新集中 → recollect回想到
